attributes.action: Offer Pakistani Christian Asia Bibi asylum in United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
BBC News: Asia Bibi: Pakistan acquits Christian woman on death row
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-46040515

BBC News: Pakistani Christian: 'Hate is spread against us'
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/world-asia-32212962/pakistani-christian-hate-is-spread-against-us

Pakistan Christian killings: "worst hate crime in the country's history"
https://www.premier.org.uk/News/World/Pakistan-Christian-killings-worst-hate-crime-in-the-country-s-history
attributes.background:
Whilst Asia Bibi has been exonerated under Pakistani blasphemy laws. Her life will continue to be under threat from radical Islamists in the region.

Offering her safe-haven in the United Kingdom is the moral and humane thing to do!
